highlightCode: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NxWelcomeModule } from 'ng-zorro-x/welcome'; @Component({ selector: 'nx-demo-welcome-basic', imports: [NxWelcomeModule], template: ` <nx-welcome nxIcon="https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_iwk9zp/afts/img/A*s5sNRo5LjfQAAAAAAAAAAAAADgCCAQ/fmt.webp" nxTitle="Hello, I'm Nx AntX" nxDescription="Base on Ant Design, AGI product interface solution, create a better intelligent vision~" /> ` }) export class NxDemoWelcomeBasicComponent {}
